instructions: # Character Sheet Inspired by various roll20 users' sheets. This sheet DOES NOT auto-calculates many fields.## Attributes* You can mouse over any field to get its attribute name.## Rolls* You can mouse over any button to get its ability name.## The Initiative button adds your token to the initiative tracker, and therefore requires you to have a token selected to work* If you notice any glaring errors or things that need correction, send a PM to Paul S. on roll20.
